displayName.french: Combattant endurci

description.english: Play either Classic Battle - Free For All or Team 30 times
description.german: Spiele entweder „Klassischer Kampf – Jeder gegen Jeden“ oder „Team“ 30 Mal
description.french: Participe 30 fois à des Batailles Classiques (Chacun pour soi ou en Équipe)
description.italian: Gioca una Battaglia Modalità classica - Aperta a Tutti o in Squadra 30 volte
description.spanish: Juega al Combate clásico en el modo batalla campal o por equipos 30 veces

displayName.french: K.O.

description.english: Play either Knockout - Classic or High Health 30 times
description.german: Spiele entweder „KO – Klassisch“ oder „Hohe Gesundheit“ 30 Mal
description.french: Participe 30 fois au mode Élimination (Classique ou Santé Élevée)
description.italian: Gioca in Modalità a eliminazione - Modalità classica o in Ottima salute 30 volte
description.spanish: Juega a Noquear en el modo clásico o vida alta 30 veces

displayName.french: Accro aux succès

description.english: Play either Hold the Gold - Classic or Bare Buns 30 times
description.german: Spiele entweder „Behalte das Gold – Klassisch“ oder „Nackter Hintern“ 30 Mal
description.french: Participe 30 fois au mode Ruée vers l'Or (Classique ou Cul nu)
description.italian: Gioca a Afferra l’Oro - Modalità classica o a Smutandati 30 volte
description.spanish: Juega a Consigue el oro en el modo clásico o culo al aire 30 veces

displayName.french: Fana de slips

description.english: Play Underpants Collector multiplayer mode 30 times
description.german: Spiele den Mehrspieler-Modus „Unterhosensammler“ 30 Mal
description.french: Participe 30 fois au mode multijoueur Collectionneur de Slips
description.italian: Gioca nella modalità multigiocatore di Colleziona-mutande 30 volte
description.spanish: Juega al modo multijugador de Coleccionista de gayumbos 30 veces

displayName.french: Apprenti Guerrier en Slip

description.english: Survive 2 minutes in Endless Butt-em-up
description.german: Überlebe 2 Minuten in Po-Prügel – Endlos
description.french: Survis 2 minutes en mode Butt-em-all Infini
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 2 minuti in un Butt-em-up Infinito
description.spanish: Sobrevive 2 minutos en Butt-em-up infinito

displayName.french: Guerrier en Slip Talentueux

description.english: Survive 5 minutes in Endless Butt-em-up
description.german: Überlebe 5 Minuten in Po-Prügel – Endlos
description.french: Survis 5 minutes en mode Butt-em-all Infini
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 5 minuti in un Butt-em-up Infinito
description.spanish: Sobrevive 5 minutos en Butt-em-up infinito

displayName.french: Guerrier en Slip Ultime

description.english: Survive 10 minutes in Endless Butt-em-up
description.german: Überlebe 10 Minuten in Po-Prügel – Endlos
description.french: Survis 10 minutes en mode Butt-em-all Infini
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 10 minuti in un Butt-em-up Infinito
description.spanish: Sobrevive 10 minutos en Butt-em-up infinito

displayName.french: Les Bases

description.english: Complete all of "The Basics" lessons
description.german: Schließe alle Grundlagen-Lektionen ab
description.french: Termine toutes les leçons "Les Bases"
description.italian: Completa tutte le lezioni Le Basi
description.spanish: Completa todas las lecciones de Lo Básico

displayName.french: Joueur patient

description.english: Wait 15 minutes in the "Choose Your Underwearrior" screen
